nodes.text: Rob Bredow is a visual effects artist currently serving as the senior vice president, executive creative director, and head of Industrial Light & Magic at Lucasfilm. He guided the development of Star Wars: Trials on Tatooine, served as visual effects supervisor and a co-producer for Solo: A Star Wars Story, and wrote Industrial Light & Magic Presents: Making Solo: A Star Wars Story.

Bredow was formerly the vice president of new media for Lucasfilm and head of its Advanced Development Group. He helped launch ILMxLAB in 2015 and briefly served as Lucasfilm's chief technology officer.
